## TanHNode class

Computes the hyperbolic tangent function

**Signature:**

```typescript
declare class TanHNode extends GenericMathNode 
```
**Extends:** [GenericMathNode](doc/markdown/./scene.genericmathnode.md)

## Remarks

Returns tanh(x) = sinh(x) / cosh(x) Result is in the range \[-1, 1\]. Supports scalar and vector inputs (component-wise for vectors).
